thread.title: Nike Gives the Air Max Plus a Futuristic Update
thread.title_full: Nike Gives the Air Max Plus a Futuristic Update

author: Lia McGarrigle
title: Nike Gives the Air Max Plus a Futuristic Update
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Nike
Model: Air Max Plus Slip
Key Features: The Air Max Plus Slip features a laceless sock-like fit and is available in two colorways, “Gold/Black” and “Navy/Silver.”
Release Date: Available now.
Price: $180.00
Availability: Nike.com 
Editor’s Notes: With a TN logo on the tongue, the Air Max Plus Slip is obviously referencing the ‘98 classic Air Max Plus, but its design updates give the shoe a more futuristic feel.
The fit hugs the foot, but it’s easy to pull-on thanks to its neoprene inner sleeve and heel pull-tab. With the strong metallic elements and a sleek design, this one’s a definite head-turner.
In other sneaker news, here are the 10 best products to drop this week and where to find them.
